package.name: Advocado
package.summary: Drive more sales to your store through your customers’ social networks. Sign up for a free trial now!
package.description:
Advocado helps you drive more sales through your customers' social networks. It incentivizes your customers to refer your business to their friends.

It has 2 key features:

  1. Offer an instant discount to encourage social sharing
    Give your customers an instant discount at checkout when they share your products on their social networks. This generates greater branding and awareness for your business.
  2. (Coming soon) Further reward your customers with a promo code to drive more sales.
    When your customers successfully refer a purchasing customer (or MORE) to you, you further reward your customers and their referred friends with a promo code. The more friends join in and buy from you, the greater the value of cashback you give to all of them.

Benefits

  1. Ditch troublesome advertising dollars - Save time and money spent on creating an extensive online advertising effort with our easy to install plugin.
  2. Get people to talk about your brand - Turn your customers into your loyal advocates and create word-of-mouth-advertising that is trusted
  3. Generate more referrals - Reward your customers for every successful referral they make and drive more sales for your business.
  4. Easy to set up - You can install our plugin or copy & paste a snippet of codes to get Advocado up and running. Our set up wizard will guide you through this.
package.notes: The extension is stable. Go to http://getadvocado.com to sign up for an account.
